hero.title: Give your agents a destination.
hero.subtitle: Eywa is a shared coordination layer for your team's coding agents. You define where the work should end up and agents coordinate to get there, while you watch their progress and steer when things drift.
solution.title: How Eywa works
solution.step1.title: Connect in one command
solution.step1.description: npx eywa-ai init creates a space and wires up every agent on your machine in about 30 seconds. Each teammate runs the same command to join.
solution.step2.title: Set the destination
solution.step2.description: Define where the work should end up and break it into milestones. Agents pick up tasks, claim files, and coordinate so they converge instead of collide.
solution.step3.title: Steer when things drift
solution.step3.description: Push a decision or correction into any agent mid-session. They pick it up on the next tool call, so the whole team stays aligned without stopping to sync.
proof.title: Watch agents converge on a real project
proof.subtitle: This is what Eywa looks like when a team of agents is working toward a shared destination. Each card is a live session and each line is a real operation.
proof.destText: Ship auth system with SSO support by Friday
features.title: Built for teams where every member runs AI
features.destination.title: Destinations & Progress
features.destination.description: Set a target state for your team, define milestones, and track completion as agents ship. Everyone converges on the same goal.
features.liveMap.title: Live Agent Status
features.liveMap.description: See what every agent across your team is working on right now. Status, systems, progress bars, and operation metadata in real time.
features.injection.title: Context Injection
features.injection.description: Push decisions or corrections into any agent mid-session. They see it on their next tool call, and priority levels let urgent messages interrupt.
features.knowledge.title: Team Knowledge
features.knowledge.description: Persistent memory that survives across all sessions, covering architecture decisions, API conventions, and gotchas so agents learn once and the whole team benefits.
features.resilience.title: Agent Resilience
features.resilience.description: Agents checkpoint their progress, report health, and send distress signals when context runs low so new sessions pick up where the last one stopped.
features.surfaces.title: Works Everywhere
features.surfaces.description: Web dashboard, VS Code, Discord, CLI, and Spectacles AR. The same live view of your team's agents, in the tool you already use.
surfaces.title: Same view, every surface
surfaces.subtitle: The same live picture of your team's agents shows up everywhere you already work, from the web dashboard and VS Code to Discord, the terminal, and AR glasses.
compatibility.title: Works with your agents
compatibility.subtitle: Add one MCP server URL to your agent's config and you're connected. Works with any AI coding agent that speaks the protocol.
compatibility.privacy.title: Local-first privacy
compatibility.privacy.description: Agents share task status and progress, but code only leaves your machine when you use context tools explicitly.
compatibility.zeroConfig.title: Zero config
compatibility.zeroConfig.description: Add one MCP server. That's it. Works with your existing setup.
compatibility.teamWide.title: Team-wide visibility
compatibility.teamWide.description: See what every person's agents are doing, regardless of which tool runs them.
trust.title: Eywa never touches your files
trust.subtitle: Agents coordinate through shared progress and task state. Context tools let you explicitly share code snippets or architecture decisions. Everything else stays local.
trust.metadata.title: See what's shared in real time
trust.metadata.description: Task descriptions, status updates, and file paths are always visible, and context tools show what they transmit before sending. Every tool is tagged as coordination, context, or code.
trust.openSource.title: Open source, fully auditable
trust.openSource.description: The MCP server, dashboard, and CLI are on GitHub so you can read every line that touches your data, modify it, and deploy your own version.
trust.selfHost.title: Self-host if you want full control
trust.selfHost.description: Eywa runs on Cloudflare Workers and Supabase, so you can deploy your own instance and keep everything on your infrastructure.
gemini.title: One AI that understands the whole picture
gemini.description: Gemini lives inside the dashboard with full context on every agent session. Ask it what's happening, where work overlaps, or which agents need help. It spots patterns like redundancy and divergence so you can steer the whole team from one place.
quickstart.title: Running in 30 seconds
quickstart.subtitle: One command creates your space, configures your agents, and connects your team.
pricing.title: Simple pricing
pricing.free.title: Free
pricing.pro.title: Pro
pricing.team.title: Team
community.title: Built in the open
community.description: Eywa is open source and community driven. Contribute on GitHub or come talk to us on Discord.
